content: crocheted drops mittens in alaska with edge in puddel drops extra 0-421 size one-size materials drops alaska from garnstudio 100 g color no 03 light gray and use drops puddel from garnstudio 50 g color no 06 light gray drops crochet hook size 6 mm/ j/10 or hook size you need to get 11 half_double_crochet on 10 cm / 4 in width *drops puddel discontinued / alternative yarns yarn group e * uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3144&cid=19
